response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest standards and expectations. Given its unparalleled quality and functionality, we believe it's worth every penny. We're offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $14,500. This is a special opportunity to own something truly remarkable at a price that reflects its value but also allows us to cover our costs and ensure continued innovation. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 14500}
